forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this morning, becoming a steady rain during the afternoon hours. High around 15C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain for the afternoon. High 58F. Winds SE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with some rain showers. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with showers. Low 53F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with rain likely. High 14C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Thundershowers following a period of rain and wind early. High 57F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 7C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 44F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 14C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 57F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 8C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 46F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High near 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High 59F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Becoming windy late. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 47F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with occasional rain...mainly in the morning. High around 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with rain ending in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Low 9C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Low 49F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High around 60F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
